description: Sprint 1: Authentication & Admin Shell - Set up AWS Cognito auth, NextAuth.js integration, admin layout, dashboard, and route protection

userStories.title: Add authentication dependencies to package.json
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the required packages installed for authentication.
acceptanceCriteria: Install aws-sdk packages if not present (@aws-sdk/client-cognito-identity-provider)

userStories.title: Add Cognito environment variables template
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the required environment variables documented.

userStories.title: Create auth configuration library
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a centralized auth configuration module.
acceptanceCriteria: Configure Cognito provider with environment variables
Add session callback to include user info

userStories.title: Create NextAuth API route
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the NextAuth API endpoint configured.

userStories.title: Create auth middleware for route protection
userStories.description: As a developer, I need middleware to protect admin routes.
acceptanceCriteria: Middleware checks for valid session on /admin/* routes
Public routes (/, /services/*, etc.) are not affected

userStories.title: Create admin login page
userStories.description: As an admin, I need a login page to access the admin panel.
acceptanceCriteria: Page displays login form with email and password fields
Form submits to NextAuth signIn function
Shows error message on failed login
Uses dark theme consistent with site branding
Verify in browser: login form renders correctly

userStories.title: Create admin layout with sidebar navigation
userStories.description: As an admin, I need a consistent layout for all admin pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Layout includes left sidebar with navigation links
Sidebar links: Dashboard, Pages, Media, Leads, Knowledge, Analytics, Settings
Layout shows current user info and logout button
Uses dark theme with gold accent color (#C9A227)
Verify in browser: sidebar renders with all navigation links

userStories.title: Create admin sidebar component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a reusable sidebar component.
acceptanceCriteria: Component accepts navigation items as props
Includes icons for each navigation item (use Lucide icons)

userStories.title: Create admin dashboard page shell
userStories.description: As an admin, I need a dashboard page to view site stats at a glance.
acceptanceCriteria: Page displays welcome message with user name
Page has placeholder cards for: Total Pages, Form Submissions, Recent Activity
Cards use consistent styling with site design system
Verify in browser: dashboard renders with placeholder cards

userStories.title: Create admin stat card component
userStories.description: As a developer, I need a reusable stat card component for the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Component accepts: title, value, icon, optional trend indicator
Styled with dark background and gold accent

userStories.title: Create admin pages list page shell
userStories.description: As an admin, I need a page to view and manage all site pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Page displays table with columns: Page Name, Status, Last Modified, Actions
Table shows hardcoded list of current site pages (homepage, about, services, etc.)
Status shows 'Published' badge for all pages (hardcoded for now)
Actions column has Edit button (links to /admin/pages/[slug]/edit)
Verify in browser: pages table renders with all 26 current pages listed

userStories.title: Create admin media library page shell
userStories.description: As an admin, I need a page to view and manage uploaded images.
acceptanceCriteria: Page displays grid of placeholder image cards
Each card shows image thumbnail, filename, upload date
Verify in browser: media grid renders with placeholder content

userStories.title: Create admin leads page shell
userStories.description: As an admin, I need a page to view form submissions.
acceptanceCriteria: Page displays table with columns: Date, Name, Email, Source Page, Status
Table shows 'No submissions yet' empty state
Note: This is read-only dashboard, data comes from Notion (future)
Verify in browser: leads table renders with empty state

userStories.title: Create admin settings page shell
userStories.description: As an admin, I need a settings page to configure site options.
acceptanceCriteria: Page has sections: General, Integrations, SEO
Each section shows placeholder form fields (non-functional)
Verify in browser: settings page renders with section placeholders

userStories.title: Add logout functionality
userStories.description: As an admin, I need to be able to log out of the admin panel.
acceptanceCriteria: Logout button in admin layout calls NextAuth signOut
After logout, user is redirected to /admin/login
Verify in browser: clicking logout redirects to login page
